<!-- audit-pr-docs -->

## ❌ Audit PR Docs

**Last updated:** 2026-02-22 11:47:39 PT

Found 1 pre-existing violation across 1 file. No new violations detected. The violation at `docs/learned/cli/erk-exec-commands.md:142` was previously flagged in 2 existing unresolved review threads — see those threads for the fix.

### Patterns Checked
✅ Verbatim code blocks — None found in changed docs
✅ Duplicative sections — None found in changed docs  
❌ Inaccurate claims — Pre-existing at `erk-exec-commands.md:142` (covered by existing threads)
✅ Drift risk (new) — No new drift risk introduced

### Files Reviewed

| File | Verdict | Duplicative % | High Value % | Issues |
|------|---------|---------------|--------------|--------|
| `docs/learned/cli/erk-exec-commands.md` | SIMPLIFY | 5% | 80% | 1 inaccurate (pre-existing, covered by existing threads) |
| `docs/learned/planning/lifecycle.md` | KEEP | 10% | 75% | 0 new |
| `docs/learned/planning/workflow.md` | KEEP | 5% | 80% | 0 new |
| `docs/learned/planning/workflow-markers.md` | KEEP | 5% | 85% | 0 |
| `docs/learned/planning/pr-review-workflow.md` | DELETED — correct cleanup |  |  | — |

### Pre-Existing Issue (Already Flagged)

`docs/learned/cli/erk-exec-commands.md:142`: Inaccurate claim — `"GraphiteBranchManager restores the original branch after tracking"` is incorrect (branch creation does NOT checkout the new branch). Also names private methods (`create_branch()`, `checkout_branch()`). Two existing unresolved review threads cover this: the fix commits referenced in those threads did not persist in the current PR state.

---

### Activity Log
- **2026-02-22 11:47:39 PT**: Audited 5 docs (4 modified, 1 deleted). No new violations. Pre-existing inaccuracy at erk-exec-commands.md:142 already covered by 2 existing review threads that show fix commits but the fix has not yet persisted in the PR's current HEAD.

<!-- tripwires-review -->

## ✅ Tripwires Review

**Last updated:** 2026-02-22 11:46:11 PT

No new tripwire violations detected. All existing review threads have been resolved.

### Tripwires Triggered

Based on the changed file paths in this PR, I loaded and checked:
- **Universal tripwires** (docs/learned/universal-tripwires.md)
- **Architecture tripwires** (docs/learned/architecture/tripwires.md) - Changes in gateway/plan_data_provider
- **CLI tripwires** (docs/learned/cli/tripwires.md) - Changes in src/erk/cli/commands/
- **Planning tripwires** (docs/learned/planning/tripwires.md) - Changes in exec scripts and metadata
- **Testing tripwires** (docs/learned/testing/tripwires.md) - Test file deletions
- **Documentation tripwires** (docs/learned/documentation/tripwires.md) - Changes in docs/learned/

### Tier 1: Mechanical Pattern Matches

✅ `subprocess\.run\(` - Found in production code, but all instances are in core prompt executor modules (approved exceptions)
✅ `Path\.home\(\)` - Found in tests and statusline/init modules (approved exceptions)
✅ Default parameter values - None detected in the diff

### Tier 2: Semantic Matches

✅ **Removing a workflow command or CLI entry** - Checked all string-based dispatch maps (WORKFLOW_COMMAND_MAP) and references
✅ **Deleting gateway/exec script files** - Verified no orphaned references remain
✅ **Modifying documentation without running erk docs sync** - All documentation index files are consistent

### Review Summary

This PR removes the ephemeral plan review PR feature - a complete subsystem deletion:
- 9 files deleted (commands, exec scripts, documentation)
- 30 files modified (removing references, cleanup)

All changes are deletions or cleanup related to feature removal. Previous violations identified by the audit-pr-docs workflow have all been addressed.

### Files Reviewed

- **.claude/commands/** (2 files) - Deleted plan-review.md, updated pr-address.md
- **.claude/skills/** (2 files) - Removed plan review command references
- **docs/learned/** (8 files) - Removed pr-review-workflow.md, updated indexes and lifecycle docs
- **src/erk/cli/commands/exec/scripts/** (5 files) - Deleted 5 plan review exec scripts
- **src/erk/cli/commands/** (4 files) - Updated plan commands, removed review_pr_cleanup.py
- **tests/** (18 files) - Removed associated test files
- **packages/erk-shared/** (2 files) - Cleanup in gateway and naming modules

---

### Activity Log
- **2026-02-22 11:46:11 PT**: No new violations detected. All previous audit-pr-docs violations have been resolved. Feature removal PR with 39 files changed.
- **2026-02-22 08:06:30 PT**: No tripwire violations detected (feature removal PR - 39 files, all deletions/cleanup)
- **2026-02-22 04:57:38 PT**: No new tripwire violations detected. The existing violation (incomplete command removal) identified in the previous review remains valid and should be addressed.

2. **Orphaned tests deleted**: Removed `test_plan_header.py` entirely — all 12 tests were calling `extract_plan_header_review_pr` and `update_plan_header_review_pr` which were already deleted from plan_header.py.

> 
> Found 0 new violations across 8 files. All prior violations were addressed.
> 
> ### Patterns Checked

> > ...

> Found 3 violations across 2 files (1 new, 2 pre-existing in unchanged lines). Inline comment posted for the new violation.
>
> - `docs/learned/cli/erk-exec-commands.md:142`: Drift risk — private method names
> - `docs/learned/planning/lifecycle.md:399-406`: Pre-existing INACCURATE — Workflow Inputs table
> - `docs/learned/planning/lifecycle.md:410-413`: Pre-existing INACCURATE — Concurrency Control block

All three violations addressed in commit 4b65457e1:

1. **erk-exec-commands.md:142**: Replaced private method names (`create_branch()`, `checkout_branch()`, `GraphiteBranchManager`) with generic description per learned-docs standards.
2. **lifecycle.md Workflow Inputs**: Updated table from stale `issue_number`/`issue_title` fields to match actual workflow inputs (`plan_id`, `plan_title`, `branch_name`, `pr_number`, `model_name`).
3. **lifecycle.md Concurrency Control**: Fixed from `implement-issue-${{ github.event.inputs.issue_number }}` to `implement-plan-${{ inputs.plan_id }}`.
